lead_paragraph: A six-month training program for teams from Britain, Denmark, Iceland and Ireland aims to test the use of unmanned aircraft in emergencies.

headline.print_headline: Emergency Workers Turn to Drones to Save Lives
headline.main: Europe’s Emergency Workers Turn to Drones to Save Lives

snippet: A six-month training program for teams from Britain, Denmark, Iceland and Ireland aims to test the use of unmanned aircraft in emergencies.
abstract: Emergency response teams from Britain, Denmark, Iceland and Ireland have undergone training in Denmark to take part in six-month trial program which seeks to jump-start use of drones in emergency services.
